extendedInfo.description: The most beautiful 3D live wallpaper on Google Play for your phone or tablet! Fantasy Forest 3d Pro delivers everything what you ever wanted from live wallpaper!  Amazing colorful forest environment with lot of details will give your phone spectacular look! You do not need anymore clock widget on your phone, beautiful  fantasy clock placed in  the scene always will keep you informed about what time is now!You can choose between different cameras, day and night scenes , different clock skins and every combination will look fantastic. Fantasy Forest 3D  Pro made with OPEN GL 2.0 and optimized to consume low resources and also not to drain your battery.Installation: The main screen (long press) â Live Wallpaper â Fantasy Forest 3d ProPlease, rate!On some devices the first loading can be a little bit slow, just give it half minute.

reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful
reviews.comment: I absolutely love the squirrel and the clock.  You have outshone yourself again.  I love your work and I hope you will do some more soon.  Maybe something to do with the seaside?  So keep up the good work.
reviews.author: Maureen Davies

reviews.title: WOW!!!
reviews.comment: This is so beautiful!  I love the movement of the water as well as how smoothly the boat moves through the water.  The clock is a great touch and I like the ability to change the clock skins.  I now own all of this devs lwps & honestly cannot decide on a favorite.  Awesome job as usual dev....you are truly an amazing designer!  Oh....I have the squirrel in my pro version & he\'s adorable. :)
reviews.author: Penny Goldin

reviews.title: Could be
reviews.comment: Without automatic camera scrolling,  this just falls short.  I don\'t want to have to swipe my screen to see all the views.  All your wallpapers are this way and I have refunded three due to this shortcoming. Charge another buck and I\'ll buy them again
reviews.author: wayne powledge

reviews.title: Tops
reviews.comment: After being notified how to use, i find this app really great!.
reviews.author: John Norbury

reviews.title: Okay! Thanks, dev!!
reviews.comment: I forgot about that, but it was checked so I figured it was right.- Thanks for the help!! I\'ll have to remember that! It\'s very nice..!!!  :)
reviews.author: Marilyn C.

reviews.title: Not for Droid Incredible
reviews.comment: Pretty but super slow on Droid Incredible. No minimum hardware specs listed. Unusable. Oh well.
reviews.author: JRHZ28

reviews.title: Plain
reviews.comment: Sorry but it\'s a man in a boat with a fishing pole. That\'s it. The free version had a squirrel and looked different.
reviews.author: patricia bills

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Thank you for your beautiful wallpspers
reviews.author: carmenza velasquez
